tool_description: Analyzes audio quality metrics including signal-to-noise ratio, volume levels, and distortion to optimize transcription accuracy.

audio_chunk_id.description: Audio chunk identifier from Audio Buffer Manager

error_messages: Invalid audio chunk: Provide a valid audio_chunk_id from Audio Buffer Manager.
Audio data corrupted: The audio chunk contains corrupted or invalid data.
Insufficient audio data: Audio chunk is too short for meaningful quality analysis.
usage: Provide audio_chunk_id from buffered audio. Optionally set quality thresholds with min_snr_db and min_volume_db. Returns comprehensive quality metrics for the audio segment.
